awd_titl_txt: RIA: Control of Nonlinear Flexible Structures
awd_abstract_narration: This project addresses the control of nonlinearly flexible                      structures.  The intent is to determine stabilizing controls                    based on the energy-momentum methodology.  The system                           considered comprises a flexible assemblage and a controller.                    The demand is imposed that a specified state be an                              equilibrium state, and then the energy-momentum method is                       used to find conditions which the controller must satisfy,                      thus characterizing a class of stabilizing controllers.  A                      nonlinear model for the flexible appendage is used and                          imposes no restrictions on deformation.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MINNESOTA
